meaningMnemonic: "A <radical>scooter</radical>!" you <radical>announce</radical>. You are announcing this because you decided this is what you would <kanji>create</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: But, a scooter has been <kanji>create</kanji>d before. What is different about yours? The scooter you will create is specifically designed to keep <reading>zo</reading>mbies (ぞう) busy.
